description: A recipe detailing the ingredients and method for Jade Treasure Soup.
bgDescription: A recipe found in an old book by Panhua, it is said that following this recipe can recreate the long-lost wartime dish, the Jade Treasure Soup that people describe as â€œa condensed bowl of Jinzhou". However, through time, the terms written in the recipe have become obscure and difficult to understand. Before cooking, it is necessary to further confirm the specific ingredients.
